channel.title: Talks on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Yarra Framework

item.title: Yarra Presented at ESMRMB 'MRI Together' Workshop
item.description: The Yarra Framework has recently been presented at the ESMRMB Workshop “MRI Together”. If you are interested to learn about the background why we developed Yarra and how we are using it in our clinical practice, take a look at the talk “Distributed Image Reconstruction in Academia”
